TitMainTitle: Group portrait of wedding party and others, including groom Mr. Bacon wearing tuxedo and bride Mrs. Bacon, wearing gown with sheer yoke, lace ruffle, and lace trimmed veil, and holding bouquet of light colored carnations, with Crawford Nelms, on far left, and George Dudley, second from left, posed interior with ferns and potted palms stenciled "Wagoner" possibly for Crouch - Curry wedding in Holy Institute Baptist Church, Aliquippa
